feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • App migration queue created consistently by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14076
  • Set DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE on build by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14078

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.6...2.29.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update MongoDB. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14082
  • Fix an issue where null values were causing an error in automation loops by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14083

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.7...2.29.8

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Stripping credentials from Couch URLs + test cases by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14084

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.8...2.29.9

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update MongoDB version to 6.7.0 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14087

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.9...2.29.10

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Separate SQS migration into another environment variable by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14089

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.10...2.29.11
